additionalParams.script:
#!/bin/sh -f

set -x

gsh modify_ne -ni p4-pcc-1 -mgi 1 -mc 4 -ari 1 -asi 4 -ap 1

gsh create_imsins -imsi 24080 -rs home -dn mnc080.mcc240.gprs -np e214 -ac true -na international -rd 5 -ad 86582 -m1 NULL -m2 NULL -m3 NULL -eplp NULL -rn ericsson.se -hn esm -s8 gtp -gcc NULL -wcc NULL -lcc NULL -rfsp NULL -arph 1 -arpm 2 -gss gr -vlbo NULL -aifv true -mavs 1 -mavr 2 -earplr 0 -st true -sra noaction -ssc NULL -iess NULL -pcr false -sps8 NULL -ivss NULL -sdssc none -qpmll NULL -srgr true -uut NULL -nia denied -drcl 0 -urcl 0 -vlbaoi NULL -iri NULL -crs allowed_cs_service -arpnl NULL -qpmw 1 -qpmg 1 -mps NULL
gsh create_plmn -mcc 240 -mnc 80 -pn 24080 -fnn NULL -snn NULL -ci false -me false -s5 gtp -local true -voip no -sl true -nbt NULL -urcl 0 -drcl 0 -tr NULL -ecvh true -gswgli off

gsh modify_date_and_time -tz CET
gsh create_ntp_server -ip 10.35.216.171  
gsh create_ntp_server -ip 10.35.216.172  
gsh create_ntp_server -ip 10.35.216.173  
 

gsh create_ip_network -nw Default -local false

gsh create_eth_port -eqp 1.1 -ep 1 -fc false -as up
gsh create_eth_port -eqp 1.1 -ep 2 -fc false -as up

gsh create_eth_vlan -eqp 1.1 -ep 1 -vid 0
gsh create_eth_vlan -eqp 1.1 -ep 2 -vid 0

gsh create_inbound_pf_policy -ifp ETH_1_1_1_0_Default
gsh create_inbound_pf_rule -ifp ETH_1_1_1_0_Default -fr 1 -r permit -p ip -d NULL -dm NULL -sip 0.0.0.0 -sipm 0.0.0.0 -dip 0.0.0.0 -dipm 0.0.0.0 -pp 0 -ppq gt -ipo true -sp 0 -spq gt -dp 0 -dpq gt -tf NULL -tfm NULL -it 0 -itq gt -sd NULL -lt false

gsh create_ip_interface -ifn ETH_1_1_1_0_Default -ip 21.30.1.21 -mask 255.255.255.0 -rip NULL -eqp 1.1 -ep 1 -vid 0 -ifp ETH_1_1_1_0_Default -nw Default
gsh create_router_instance -eqp 1.1 -nw Default -ip NULL -sn NULL -sc NULL -sl NULL
gsh create_static_route -eqp 1.1 -nw Default -dip 0.0.0.0 -mask 0.0.0.0 -gip 21.30.1.254

gsh create_bfd -nw Default -dtx 50 -mrx 50 -mult 5
gsh create_bfd_neighbor -nw Default -ip 21.30.1.254

gsh create_ip_service -sn OAM -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn NTP -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn DNS -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn EBM -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S11-GTP-C -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S10-GTP-C -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S1-MME-1 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S1-MME-2 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S6a-1 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn S6a-2 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn SBI-Server -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn SBI-Client -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn N2-1 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service -sn N2-2 -dscp NULL -nw Default
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn OAM -ip 10.81.41.133
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn NTP -ip 10.81.41.133
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn DNS -ip 10.81.41.133
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn EBM -ip 10.81.41.133
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S11-GTP-C -ip 10.81.41.149
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S10-GTP-C -ip 10.81.41.149
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S1-MME-1 -ip 10.81.41.145
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S1-MME-2 -ip 10.81.41.146
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S6a-1 -ip 10.81.41.147
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn S6a-2 -ip 10.81.41.148
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn SBI-Server -ip 10.81.41.144
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn SBI-Client -ip 10.81.41.144
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn N2-1 -ip 10.81.41.142
gsh create_ip_service_address -sn N2-2 -ip 10.81.41.143

gsh create_n2 -n2 n2 -mrt 58 -idt 60 -no 3
gsh create_s11 -s11 s11
gsh create_s1_mme -s1 s1_mme -no 1
gsh modify_gtp_v2 -era off

gsh create_ip_endpoint_list -ln NRFDiscHttpServer
gsh create_ip_endpoint_list -ln NRFNfmHttpServer
gsh create_ip_endpoint_list -ln NSSFHttpServer
gsh create_ip_endpoint -ln NRFDiscHttpServer -ipepid 1 -ip 172.2.51.1 -port 8181
gsh create_ip_endpoint -ln NRFNfmHttpServer -ipepid 1 -ip 172.2.51.1 -port 8181
gsh create_ip_endpoint -ln NSSFHttpServer -ipepid 1 -ip 172.2.51.1 -port 83

gsh create_nrf_instance -id 1 -mgrln NRFNfmHttpServer -discln NRFDiscHttpServer -cache off
gsh create_nssf_instance -id 1 -selectionln NSSFHttpServer

gsh create_sctp_profile -pn S1_MME_SCTP -pmtu 1418
gsh create_sctp_profile -pn S6a_SCTP -pmtu 1418
gsh create_sctp_end_point -no 1 -portno 36412 -pn S1_MME_SCTP -primsn S1-MME-1 -secsn S1-MME-2 
gsh create_sctp_end_point -no 2 -portno 3868 -pn S6a_SCTP -primsn S6a-1 -secsn S6a-2 
gsh create_sctp_end_point -no 3 -portno 38412 -pn S1_MME_SCTP -primsn N2-1 -secsn N2-2

gsh create_diameter_application -da s6a -dh p4-pcc-1-mme -rn ericsson.se
gsh create_local_diameter_host -dh p4-pcc-1-mme -rn ericsson.se -no 2
gsh create_diameter_peer -ip 172.2.49.1 -pn 1 -portno 3868 -sip NULL -prio NULL -dh p4-pcc-1-mme -rn ericsson.se
gsh create_diameter_realm -da s6a -rn ericsson.se -dpl 1 -ls true -sdpl NULL -sls true

gsh modify_subscriber_authentication -mavp off -savp off
gsh create_supi_range -imsi 24080 -vops 3gpp -rs home
gsh create_supported_slice -sn 1 -sst 1 -sd 1

gsh modify_nea_algorithm -name nea0 -prio 1
gsh modify_nea_algorithm -name nea1 -prio 2
gsh modify_nea_algorithm -name nea2 -prio 3
gsh modify_nea_algorithm -name nea3 -prio 0
gsh modify_nia_algorithm -name nia1 -prio 2
gsh modify_nia_algorithm -name nia2 -prio 1
gsh modify_nia_algorithm -name nia3 -prio 0
gsh modify_eea_algorithm -name eea0 -prio 1
gsh modify_eea_algorithm -name eea1 -prio 0
gsh modify_eea_algorithm -name eea2 -prio 0
gsh modify_eea_algorithm -name eea3 -prio 0
gsh modify_eia_algorithm -name eia1 -prio 2
gsh modify_eia_algorithm -name eia2 -prio 1
gsh modify_eia_algorithm -name eia3 -prio 0

/tmp/DPE_SC/LoadUnits/ttx/int/bin/set_sysprop pcf_available false

# Static GW selection
gsh modify_node_function -name static_gw_selection -state on
gsh create_ga -gan GA1
gsh create_ga_ta_range -gan GA1 -tan GA1_TA2 -mcc 240 -mnc 80 -first 0 -last 65535
gsh create_gw_selection_sgw -sgw p4-pcc-1-sgw -sgwv4 10.81.41.139 -sgwv6 NULL -gcap 100 -gan GA1
gsh create_apn_pgw -ai 1 -pgw p4-pcc-1-pgw
gsh create_gw_selection_pgw -pgw p4-pcc-1-pgw -pgwv4 10.81.41.134 -pgwv6 NULL -gcap 100 -gwt SGW_COMBINED -pt GTPV2 -sgw p4-pcc-1-sgw
gsh create_gw_selection_apn -ai 1 -an internet -ao mnc080.mcc240.gprs

gsh modify_subscriber_authentication -mavp off -savp off

gsh modify_feature_state -fsi mme_pool -fs ACTIVATED

gsh modify_node_function -name dns_prior_to_static_gw_selection -state on

gsh create_dns -dn epc.mnc080.mcc240.3gppnetwork.org. -qt recursive -ct 604800 -lct 300 -dcm central
gsh create_dns_server -dn epc.mnc080.mcc240.3gppnetwork.org. -ns dallas.ericsson.se.
gsh create_dns_server_address -dn epc.mnc080.mcc240.3gppnetwork.org. -ns dallas.ericsson.se. -ip 10.81.112.49
